document_data.name: Gundul Hulvesper
document_data.mainbody: '''Gundul Hulvesper''' was a breeder of [[horse]]s in the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]] in [[the Vast]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/57/The Everwinking Eye: At Home in Maskyr's Eye|20}}
document_data.Relationships: His youngest son was [[Torzhin Hulvesper]], an acolyte of [[Chauntea]] at the [[House of Plenty (Maskyr's Eye)|House of Plenty]].{{Cite polyhedron/55/The Everwinking Eye: A Closer Look at Maskyr's Eye|24}}
document_data.Description: He had a stocky build and a hooked nose.
document_data.Personality: His humor was broad and he was known for driving a hard bargain.
document_data.Home: He dwelled at Hulvesper Farm. It was found just south of the bluff on which [[Maskyr's Tower]] once stood, which itself was roughly due south of the village center and on the west of the road.
document_data.Activities: One of the most well-respected horse breeders of Maskyr's Eye, he produced the popular [[blackhair]] breed of equine.
